name: Euclidean Invasion
description:
CONTROLS

W / Up Arrow Key - Move Forward

S / Down Arrow Key - Move Backward

A / Left Arrow Key - Move Left

D / Right Arrow Key - Move Right

Mouse - Aim

Left Click / Ctrl - Shoot (Hold down for rapid fire but watch your ammo, it reduces while shooting and regenerates only when you stop)

Right Click / Alt - Fire Missile (Takes out  multiple enemies at once. You get only 5 per playthrough)

Esc - Pause game.
